description:
This is a small, rectangular container of brown corrugated cardboard for rifle cartridges, stamped with markings and trademark symbols.  This particular ammunition box possesses a large, yellow-coloured label, upon which, in red and black lettering, is printed the text:

.30 Winchester

Soft Point Lead Bullets

<color_red>WINCHESTER TRADEMARK</color>

20

WINCHESTER MODEL 1894 SOFT POINT CARTRIDGES.

<color_red>WINCHESTER MAKE.</color>

WINCHESTER REPEATING ARMS CO., NEW HAVEN, CONN.  U.S.
//: The size dimensions are completely provisional and just designed to fit 20 .30-30 rounds. The current modelled size is for a box of 4x5.5x7.5 cm with wall thicknesses of 0.25 cm.

description: This is a small, rectangular container of brown corrugated cardboard for pistol cartridges, stamped with markings and trademark symbols.
//: The size dimensions are completely provisional and just designed to fit 20 .45 Auto rounds. The current modelled size is for a box of 4x4x7 cm with wall thicknesses of 0.25 cm.
